text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Take off…!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: What does that mean…? Is it some type of cake?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Take off is the phase of flight in which an aerospace vehicle leaves the ground and becomes airborne. It refers to the gradual ascension that said vehicles take on a runway.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: So Mayano-kun, you want Oguri-san to fly? But… how would she even do that? Moreover, how would that help us bring back the star?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hayahide-san, you're completely wrong☆ You see, the thing we found was… a huge sled!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A sled…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehh!? That seems so cool! Actually, we just found this huge sled on the ground too!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah…! You're talking about the sled from back then!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yup, that's the one! It looked like it was still in good condition, so we dragged it here with us☆

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I see. So that sled will allow us to easily bring back the star… Yet I still have no idea how that relates to taking off…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Then that means the problem is solved. Great, now where's the sled, Mayano?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Give us a moment, Marve-chin and I will get it ready for you!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Please wait. Oguri-san, do you truly plan on going through with this!? Even if the transportation issue has been solved there is still the blizzard to deal with.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: We haven't done enough to completely reassure your fans yet. I think we should give up on this…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But… if I run away from this challenge, then I'm not the real me, not the me that everyone here believes in.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ehh…?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I feel like the reason people like me is because I can win difficult races. I can't just give up in front of them when faced with a challenge.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm not doing this just for me. If I continue the way I am now, everyone's support… I want to make my fans proud… make them glad they're supporting me.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Oguri-san…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I truly understand how you feel. If only a miracle were to happen that would cause the snow to stop falling or something of the like, then I would…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well why don't you cause a miracle to happen then, Hayahide?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What… do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You're always calculating various things, so you've probably already come up with a solution that has minimal risk… you just haven't said it yet.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You really want to help her, don't you… You should just be honest with her.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It is quite odd hearing you say that… But yes, I think that I can come up with something with a high probability of success, however…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ahh jeez! I'm telling you that you can do it! You believe in Ticket, yet you can't even believe in what I say!?

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: W-We… have a request as well…! Could you please assist Oguri-san with this!?

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: This isn't a normal Christmas party… It was meant to help Oguri-san get out of her slump…

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: And we had hoped… Hoped that even if it was only a little bit, that this would help her run without worry again…

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: She doesn't need to win, we just want her to run happily… She's already inspired us in so many ways, and that's enough for us…

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: But if she says that she can do it… We will believe in her all the way. That's because we fell in love with the Oguri-san that pushed herself to meet any challenge.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Please come up with a way to do this with as little risk as possible! We trust in Taishin-san's belief in you, Hayahide-san…!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Jeez, that's quite a lot of responsibility to put on someone. That being said… I understand. Oguri-san, I can trust in your legs, right?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah! Of course you can. My legs are what my fans cherish the most, so I have confidence in them.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Understood, then I will go forward with the assumption that we can use the road buried deep in the snow. There's something that I need to check with the manager of the log house immediately, so…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm heading out now, but I'll be back.

text_block_list.name: Oguri's Fans
text_block_list.text: Oguri-san, be careful! Oguri, don't do anything reckless!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ah, I just got a message from Oguri-san! She said that she's already made it down to the bottom of the mountain.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I see… That's great to hear. Now all we need to do is have her secure the star and come back the same way she came…

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Hayahide, you did a great job keeping your composure ☆ If she follows the ropeway, she should be able to find the road easily!

text_block_list.name: Oguri's Fans
text_block_list.text: I hope Oguri-chan is okay… Since it's her, I'm sure she'll come back safe, but still…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Mayano-kun, Marvelous-kun… I'm going to need to borrow your free-thinking minds. Is there a way to alleviate Oguri-san's fans' worries?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hold up. If that's what you're worried about… I've got an idea. Hayahide… Why don't you become Santa?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Wow! Hayahide, you look absolutely marvelous ☆ ★

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: A-Are you sure about this? Does this really suit me… I-It feels like this headpiece is going to fall off…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I told you I put it on tightly, so stop worrying… You look great. I'm glad you agreed with this. If Ticket were the one to come up with it she would have included a beard.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Taishin, this is…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You know… This was initially supposed to be a surprise from Ticket. But it's her own fault for being so late.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hayahide, you're always thinking about me, thinking about Ticket… and thinking about others. Basically, you're just like Santa, so this should be fine…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: But Santa is the most important figure during Christmas, right? Both you and him should get given something from time to time, and be happy about it, dummy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Taishin… thank you. This was a gift from you two… so I shouldn't be hesitant about wearing it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Now then, Oguri-san, sorry but it's time to change the lead of this show. Everyone here is going to become my fan.

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Woah, her hair is so fluffy! It's like Santa-san's mustache! I wanna make it into a huge braid!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Wai… Did someone just say my head was huge!? No, it just looks big because of my curly hair!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Miss, can you run backwards for us! I want to see what Santa-san looks like in a dress! It would be so cool!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ahh, I'm so glad… Everyone is so infatuated with you. I guess you have to do it to please your fans, huh?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ah, fine, but only once, okay!? Oguri-san… please come back soon…!
